name: Sherry
greetingText: Yeah, you saw it right. It’s you!
wishText: I, along with my special fondness for you, will always be with you.
text2: Guess what I was going to do.
text3: I wanted to do something big.
text5Content: That could never not be my love for you
outroText: 啊哈是的，这就是生日的小尾巴了
replayText: 点我，我猜你想要再看一遍
